part.Name: Description
part.Short: The gills of the Voidspore pulse, expanding and contracting in eerie rhythm. With each breath, it releases a cloud of obsidian spores, like fragments of the starless void. The spores shimmer before swirling back to the cap, merging into a dense, void-like plasma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blightcaps' gills twitch erratically, expanding and contracting like a heartbeat. As they exhale, they release a cloud of sickly yellow spores, resembling the dying light of a long-forsaken sun. The spores spiral back toward the cap and congeal into a rotting yellow plasma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The gills of the Burnspore flare with a faint red glow, pulsing in rhythm. With each exhale, it releases a cloud of ember-like spores, hot to the touch, their glow fading into fiery motes. They return to the cap, coalescing into a shimmering, fiery plasma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Mooncap's gills rise and fall with a strange, gravitational pull. Each breath expels a cloud of pale spores, resembling fragments of the moon's dust. The spores swirl back to the cap and congeal into a soft, silvery plasma that glows faintly in the dark.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dreamroot's gills undulate like the surface of a disturbed pond, their patterns shifting unpredictably. With each exhalation, it releases a cloud of pale, iridescent spores that shimmer like the fleeting remnants of a forgotten dream. The spores drift back to the cap and merge into a translucent, dreamlike plasma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brumes of swirling obsidian spores make the air feel heavy, as if the void itself is pressing in.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sickly yellow spores spiral through the air, carrying with them the stench of decay.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The air crackles with ember-like spores, their warmth searing the skin and the faint scent of burning embers lingering.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft, pale spores float through the air like fragments of forgotten dreams, their glow faint but eerie.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iridescent spores hang in the air, like the fading traces of a long-lost memory, their glow shifting like a phantom.
